salaryExpectations: LKR 70,000 (Qualified Plumber) to LKR 180,000+ (Contractor) per month.
futureOutlook: Similar to electricians, there is a major shortage of professionally trained and reliable plumbers in Sri Lanka. With continuous construction and the need for maintenance, demand is constant. Plumbers who are professional, punctual, and do high-quality work can build a strong reputation and a very profitable business.
